channel.title: How do i make a modzone portal for non-admins?
channel.description: I'm making a pk zone and I want to put it in the modzone on all-star scape. How do I make it so that I can let non-admins in there? This takes you to the pk zone.

item.source: How do i make a modzone portal for non-admins?

item.title: How do i make a modzone portal for non-admins?
item.dc:creator: @Darkness_Pk Darkness Pk
item.description:
@Darkness_Pk wrote:

When you are logged in do right-click on the portal and get the number.
when you are in client.java press ctrl+f to search to the number of the portal.

Search until you find something like this:

case 7315: // memberportal if (playerRights = 1) { teleportToX = ****; teleportToY = ****; sendMessage(""); } else { sendMessage("");
You should delete if (playerRights = 1) { than the portal is for all players

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make a modzone portal for non-admins?
